note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized).
title: Death rate from secondhand smoke
subtitle: Estimated annual number of deaths attributed to [secondhand smoke](#dod:secondhand_smoke) per 100,000 people. Secondhand smoke is also termed "passive smoking", which is the inhalation of smoke by someone other than the "active" smoker.
